Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the short cationic antimicrobial peptide family
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.19451300]Gram-positive bacteria:Micrococcus luteus(MIC=20μg/ml), Bacillus thuringiensis(MIC=50μg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=20μg/ml), Bacillus subtilis(MIC=50μg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.19451300]5% hemolytic activity at 40 μg/mL, 20% hemolytic at 50 μg/mL, 70% hemolytic aactivity at 100 μg/mL against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Function: Has potent antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria, but not Gram-negative bacteria. Shows a weak cytotoxicity effect against mammalian cell lines and hemolytic activity against human erythrocytes.

Literature.Title: Imcroporin, a new cationic antimicrobial peptide from the venom of the scorpion Isometrus maculates.
Literature.Author: Zhao Z, Ma Y, Dai C, Zhao R, Li S, Wu Y, Cao Z, Li W.
